inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of sickle cell disease with genotype HbSS, HbS/ Beta 0 thalassemia, HbSD, or HbSO.
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 34-year-old African American man.

inclusion.criterion: Receiving regularly-scheduled blood transfusions as part of existing medical care.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematologic parameters including: White blood cell (WBC) count within the range of 2.5 - 25.0 x 10^9 /L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematologic parameters including: Hemoglobin within the range of 5 - 11 g/dL
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ function and performance status
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 times the upper limit of normal for age, and calculated creatinine clearance or GFR ≥ 60 mL/min/1.73 m2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are taking hydroxyurea are allowed to be included in this study.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have uncontrolled illness including, but not limited to: Ongoing or active infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Emergency room admission or hospitalization for SCD-related reason in the past 30 days
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major surgery in the past 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Medical/psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements as determined by the treating physician.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known myelodysplasia of the bone marrow or abnormal bone marrow cytogenetics.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of an investigational study drug or procedure within 90 days of study enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He also had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
